channel.title: Dragana Radanovic's website
channel.description: Recent content on Dragana Radanovic's website

item.title: About me
item.description: I am an artist with completed Bachelor studies in Animation and visual effects and Master studies in Graphic storytelling, especially interested in children’s literature regarding difficult topics, unconventional children’s books and graphic narratives about marginalized experiences of the world. Currently living in Leuven, Belgium. Artist in residency -Experimental comics residency-laboratory (PFC#6 : ChiFouMi des étudiants), Angouleme, France, January 2019. -ReLocation, residency Destelheide Hanenbos, Belgium, June 2018. Exhibitions Collective Exhibition “From HAUNTED to GHOSTED” presented comics made during our Pierre Feuille Ciseaux “Student” edition (with Association Chifoumi) EESI, Angouleme, France January 2019.
